review_data.title: Typical quarter coffeehouse
review_data.content: You see mainly individuals living in the area dropping in. They take their coffee and pastry and the newspaper and spend an hour or more reading or searching their mobiles. Nice service, good coffee. Calm place centrally positioned, next to Stauffacher.

review_data.title: Immer ein guter Kaffe
review_data.content: Ein kleiner schön gelegenes Restaurant am Staufacher in Zürich. Die immer freundliche Bedienung, das gute Zeitungsangebot,. sowie kleine Zwischen Mahlzeiten...More

review_data.title: Top service, great coffees
review_data.content: We came for coffees and some desserts. Service was extremely friendly and attentive. All tasted excellent. A nice place to stay close to the famous Stauffacher square.

review_data.title: A nice, quiet café near Stauffacher with friendly, attentive service
review_data.content: Café Avenida Restaurant is one block from Stauffacher and accessed from the major tram lines. They offer a few sidewalk tables, but there is a bit of traffic at this intersection. Inside, there are mostly small round tables with tablecloths covered by a glass top....More
